posts.post_content:
Hello: I have a T206 Evers Broad Leaf PSA 2. Asking $2250. The card is crease free, downgraded due to the stain. The PSA Population report shows only 2 total are graded. Please email me at [url]bucklercards@yahoo.com[/url] with any questions. I will consider trades. 

Thanks, Chris :)

Wow man. That is an awesome card! Despite the staining, the card actually presents nicely. The image is very nice and the back is solid too. If I had the bucks I would be on this card in a heartbeat! This must be a touch on to let go of.
